<p>
To whom it may concern:--
</p><p>
Colonel Burr, being on urgent public business, is to be put across the
ferry to New-Windsor without delay. Given this second day of June,
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1779">1779</a>.
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=alm" rel="me">ALEXANDER McDOUGALL</a>, Major-general.
</p>
